tasks.label: ESP: Deploy & Reset
tasks.command: Get-ChildItem ESP | ForEach-Object { py -m mpremote connect COM7 fs cp $_.FullName :/ } ; py -m mpremote connect COM7 reset

tasks.label: ESP: Run (mount, no copy)
tasks.command: py -m mpremote connect COM7 mount ./ESP exec "import main"

tasks.label: ESP: List files
tasks.command: py -m mpremote connect COM7 fs ls

tasks.label: ESP: Copy current file
tasks.command: py -m mpremote connect COM7 fs cp ${file} :/
